body: @SatchPangit I recommend reading the previous ones
so ig this is in the same universe as that yuri demon king + hero genderbend dojin

So we got a married lesbian couple who are former retainers of Nobunaga then Nobunaga turns himself to be a woman who married Toyohisa then got a child of theirs...in the modern world we got an idiot rich kid who fell in love with the red hair lesbian who keeps on pestering her so she finally told him that she's married to green hair then police came to apprehend him.
I look forward to the translation
